title: Verify "Please review the shift details" is presented before proceeding to booking
custom_preconds:
Exp: SHIFT_REVIEW_HOLD_TIME_HOURS 
* Set the exp to 36 (hr) by default on Staging (should be 240 in QA)

custom_steps_separated.content: On Open shifts screen, Pro tap on a shift starting more than 2 days
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro is redirected to shift detail screen

Pro should see the "Please review the shift details" CTA at the bottom of the shift detail screen
Pro should be able to proceed when countdown is less than 1m (around 58s left)

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/jkl12345-4444-5555-6666-777777777771)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Note: We don't apply gig hold logic to 
* multi-day shifts with "same worker required multi-day gig" and "Let the shifts go unfilled" selected
* LTA shifts
